General.Name: EAM Solar ASA
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: EAM Solar ASA acquires, owns, and operates solar power plants in Europe. The company sells electricity under long-term fixed price sales contracts. It owns and operates 4 solar power plants with a combined installed capacity of 4.0 MW in Italy. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Oslo, Norway.
